# Sources

- Methylcobalamin
- Adenosylcobalamin
- Hydroxocobalamin
- [Cyanocobalamin]({{< var ref-cyanocobalamin.path >}})

## Cyanocobalamin {#cyanocobalamin}

- A theorized problematic source of Vitamin B12
- This is the **most** common form of Vitamin B12 in modern foods


# Avoid

:::{.callout-caution}


Some sources warn individuals to avoid ingesting B12 via [cyanocobalamin](#cyanocobalamin)

:::

# Function



# Deficiency {#deficiency}

B<sub>12<sub> deficiency causes an increase in cholesterol synthesis.
